Reviews.Content: wife stayed weeks ago pleasantly surprised excellence service quality food stayed night definitely wont night stay management team seen customer responsive highly recommend hotel quality service price hotel makes compelling choice food par five star hotels minus cost arthur tx

Reviews.Title: “Customer Service? Check. Good location? Check. Great rooms? Check, check.”

Reviews.Content: comes spending money hotel dollar wasted bit property hotel conveniently located staff absolutely wonderful hardest cater customer service definitely main focal theirs spacious screen tvs beds beyond comfortable literally fell asleep soon head hit pillow definitely recommend ill staying

Reviews.Title: “Had a wonderful time.”
Reviews.Author: Seedlet
Reviews.Content: spent week boyfriend time staff super nice helpful neat clean huge spent 90 time dallas inside nice tv view slept rock night pretty weird usually dont sleep outside own bed comfy warm heard else except occasionally halls people chatting pick complaint bit weird getting parking lot apparently dallas capital world easily confused driving id probably avoid city hahaha anyway totally stay dallas

Reviews.Title: “Recent flooding - Travelers beware”
Reviews.Author: SDTravel10
Reviews.Content: recently stayed hilton garden inn market center trip primarily location wouldnt nickle dime upscale hotel absolutely packed arrived lateevening apparently lot corporate trainings events warning sign closed restaurant tarps hanging interior walls told massive leak flooding occured recently result musty bit unpleasant arrival free internet appreciated 1095 charge breakfast buffet overall weird vibe happy moving night
